MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the EH9 postcode area of Edinburgh. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:19pm. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:47pm on Saturday, 20th February 2021
